enhanced_by.reason: The stream method relies on the input being parsed, which is set up by the parse method.
The stream method can also be influenced by the fragment parsing state, which is set up by the parseFragment method.
Both the stream and iterator methods provide a way to iterate over elements, making assertions about the stream method easier to construct based on the iterator's behavior.
The selectFirst method can be used to find the first matching element, which can help in constructing assertions for the stream method by verifying the presence of specific elements.
